Posts.Content: I had my last chemi january 13 2016.  My hair was a little thin but now this is ridiculous.  I had 16 rounds of chemo for breast cancer after surgery .  24vrounds or radiation.  I just finished reconstruction . i feel as if this is a sick joke.  To be 3/4 recovered and left this way us wrong.  I had paclitaxel adrimycin and Cytotoxin.   I want to sue and was told i have no recourse
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back
